channel.title: Multiple Worlds
channel.description: I fixed the wilderness teleporting and now I am trying to add Multiple Worlds but I am getting stuck with these 4 errors. [code]src\server\Server.java:220: error: incompatible types File load = files; ^ required: File found: File[] src\server\Server.java:236: error: incompatible types File load = files; ^ required: File found: File[] src\server\Server.java:260: error: cannot find symbol ServerSocket socket = null; ^ symbol: class ServerSocket location: class Server src\server\Server.java:262: error: cannot find symbol socket = new ServerSocket(world); ^ symbol: class ServerSocket location: class Server Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I don't know what I am doing wrong since I followed this tutorial and added the imports. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520953.0.html

Well you didn’t import ServerSocket and the variable files is probably an array, and load is not.

item.title: Multiple Worlds
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I fixed the wilderness teleporting and now I am trying to add Multiple Worlds but I am getting stuck with these 4 errors.

src\server\Server.java:220: error: incompatible types File load = files; ^ required: File found: File[] src\server\Server.java:236: error: incompatible types File load = files; ^ required: File found: File[] src\server\Server.java:260: error: cannot find symbol ServerSocket socket = null; ^ symbol: class ServerSocket location: class Server src\server\Server.java:262: error: cannot find symbol socket = new ServerSocket(world); ^ symbol: class ServerSocket location: class Server Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .
I don’t know what I am doing wrong since I followed this tutorial and added the imports.
